articles.description: Sony's State of Play for PlayStation wasn't quite as exciting as I hoped it'd be but we did get one very exciting announced. Final Fantasy VII Remake will ...
articles.content: Sony’s State of Play for PlayStation wasn’t quite as exciting as I hoped it’d be but we did get one very exciting announced. Final Fantasy VII Remake will be coming to the PlayStation 5 this summer.… [+2479 chars]
